text.section: There is a Virginia-Maryland Regional College of Veterinary Medicine.
In addition to the provisions of this subtitle the College is subject to the provisions of Title 11 (Maryland Higher Education Commission) of this article.

The College shall be operated under the terms and conditions agreed to in:
The Agreement of Regional Cooperation between the State of Maryland and the Commonwealth of Virginia, dated February 14, 1980; and
The Agreement between Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University and the University of Maryland, College Park for a regional program in veterinary medical education, dated September 27, 1989.
The College shall be operated as one school with an administrative head at each university.
The student body of the College shall consist of 50 Virginia residents, 30 Maryland residents, and 10 at-large.
